Projekt
  • {{ section.summary }}
import { Component, Inject } from '@angular/core'; import { HttpClient } from '@angular/common/http'; @Component({ selector: 'app-nav-menu', templateUrl: './nav-menu.component.html', styleUrls: ['./nav-menu.component.css'] }) export class NavMenuComponent { isExpanded = false; lang = localStorage.getItem('lang') || "en"; collapse() { this.isExpanded = false; } temp: any; public values = [ { key: "English", value: "en" }, { key: "Polski", value: "pl" }, ] toggle() { this.isExpanded = !this.isExpanded; } public sections: Sections[] = []; constructor(http: HttpClient, @Inject('BASE_URL') baseUrl: string) { http.get(baseUrl + 'Sections?lang=' + this.lang).subscribe(result => { this.sections = result; }, error => console.error(error)); } changeLang(lang2: any) { localStorage.setItem('lang', lang2); if (this.values[1].value == localStorage.getItem('lang')) { this.temp = this.values[0]; this.values[1] = this.values[0] this.values[1] = this.temp; } window.location.reload(); } } interface Sections { id: number; summary: string; type: string; }
